section.title:
exchange rates
adding new Exchange Rate
section.para: To add a new Exchange Rate to the master list of Exchange Rates, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When adding a new Exchange Rate to the master list of Exchange Rates, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Currency you want to apply the Exchange Rate to.
You may enter multiple Exchange Rates for an individual Currency--as long as the effective dates do not overlap.
Enter the Exchange Rate to be used for the specified Currency during specified date range.

The meaning of the Exchange Rate value is configured on the Configure G/L screen in the System module. The value of Exchange Rates may be configured in either of two ways: 1) Base x Exchange Rate = Foreign or 2) Foreign x Exchange Rate = Base.
Enter the date on which the Exchange Rate becomes effective.
Enter the date after which the Exchange Rate is no longer valid.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without adding a new Exchange Rate to the master list of Exchange Rates.
Creates the Exchange Rate and adds it to the master list of Exchange Rates.
